item.title: HELP How to make a NPC yell?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

umm go to your server files and look for npchandler.java
if theres and NPc already added to say the text welcome to scapesape then just edit it and compile
if there is no go to autospawn.cfg and make a new autospawn for example
ABOVE HERE IS A REFRENCE

--------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption
spawn = 409	3090	3492	0	2614	3845	2615	3845	1	NPC that says welcome to YOUR server name

now add this code onto your npchandler.java OR yoy can chage the if (npcs[i].npcType == 409) { to the Npc Number you want or made in the autospawn.cfg

if (npcs[i].npcType == 409) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Welcome to Servername"; }
chage the servername to your server name
ALWAYS SAVE AND COMPILE
